title: What role did culture play in imperialism? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very important. it is essential to gain hearts from the conquered people because in that way they accept the situation better and that means low cost to maintain the system. Purely military means are costly and not efficient. Roman empire sustained his vast empire because elite classes all around it were prepared and willing to share roman culture and values. When it was not so, as in the case of Jews, costly wars came once and again.
In many cases it an excuse used to justify imperialism.
